title: Memories

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Re-enact something that happened in a previous game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> At the start of every night, you will be given a game. You can do one thing that happened that game to a player. You can make the event you re-enact effect different people this game.

> You cannot re-enact executions or anything the host deems too powerful.

> You can only target 1 person, but what you re-enact can effect multiple people (for example, you can re-enact Tenacious using factional kill, but you can't re-enact upgraded Militant).

> You will never be given a canned game, only games that were successful. If a game was successful the second time, you can still remember the second time.

> You will not be given a game you have already received.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > See the good faction lose the game (you can win while dead).

desc:

*"Hey remember that game when the broken role completely changed the game?"*
*"...That describes 95% of GIM games."*
